name: Enter the Digistruct
description:
Enter the Digistruct is an action/platformer taking place in a virtual world where hackers infiltrate systems to steal valuable programs or intelligence.

The Story

You play as Guy, a new member of an elusive group known as Dagger. Their task is to infiltrate the system of the Iris Corporation whom the group believes houses a powerful program that they deem to dangerous to be in their possession. Guy will come across sentient bugs, glitches and the systems own security defenders on the way to their goal.

How to Play

WASD = Movement

Space = Jump

Enter = Shoot

Reach the door at the end of the level to win.

Don't let your health reach 0!

Enemies will try to stop you from reaching the end, hitting them enough times with your pistol will destroy them.

There are 5 bonus collectibles to find in the level, find them all!

Content

There is currently one level in the game with basic mechanics. I hope to update this once in the future, adding a few extra mechanics such as powerups, health pickups and an extra level.
